snippet.textDisplay:
Polls showed that 59% of Palestinians in 2022 supported armed attacks against Israelis. A one-party state could further radicalize Palestinians. They’d see more shootings like in recent West Bank incidents. It can also weaken Israel’s international backing and make it more vulnerable to external threats.

And you can’t just ignore the ideological hostility from certain Palestinian groups that spans through decades of conflict. Starting from Ottoman era tensions. This is not something they will just forget. They want reparations.
snippet.textOriginal:

snippet.textDisplay:
1:30:34 Honestly it feels like that chat is being far more provocative in a negative manner than anyone else, and Ethan pointing this out shouldn't be seen as a bad thing. These Autistic Neck Beards think people should just listen to the smartest guy in the room and that's simply NOT THE WAY THE WORLD WORKS. You have to have conversations, like the one Hasan has with Ethan here over and over again to move the needle until its "calibrated". I genuinely think Ethan could have had a large switch up in perspective at this point, if the conversation ended right here after Hasan says some more comforting and encouraging words. He already did, but yeah, they are friends at this point and its nice to see Hasan being nice. I don't think this was the wrong direction for any of this so far.
Still curious to see where it goes... I'm honestly scared while watching this-knowing what the result of this conversation is... But I need to see what happened for myself with FULL CONTEXT.

snippet.textDisplay:
okay, since ethan wants to talk about the Israeli psyche; lets do it
- how do you get their 'psyche' to wit to view Palestinians are animals ; subhuman, are all a threat? how can they
- why do they think its funny to force the kidnapped Palestinian detainees to listen to soldiers reading the Torah to them, film it and upload it.
- how come they cant recognise that zionism and Judaism are not the same thing.
- what are they thinking about when they snip children in the head? or dropping bombs everywhere including schools and hospitals? burning people alive? or kidnapping people for no reason? or raping them to death in cages? gang rape them? then doing a pro rape rally when they are reprimanded, and their right to rape Palestinians was defended by the public and government ministers?
- or what about writing the names on the bombs for people who buy that before they drop them?
- how can they justify stopping food, water, medicine etc from entering and starving the population?
i mean i could keep going but if youre going to talk about the israeli psyche, you cannot omit this shit
what gives them the right to avoid criticism or raping kidnapped people or stopping aid from coming in?
Several Israeli government ministers have also defended the rape of Palestinian prisoners as "legitimate".

and israel isnt special,
all native people feel the same way about their home land.
